Basic Questions

What is GoodEdu ?

A platform to provide training course through video A method for lecturer to expand reputation, famous, and earn money A believable information source

What I can get after studying? Can I get certificate?

Depend on how you learn and which course do u study. Many people can make product by studying through video, then sell it and earn money. We don’t issue certificate.

How long I can use video?

03 years. We believe if video is unlimited using time, we can’t encourage u to complete studying. Moreover, video should be updated for better quality.

I can find same video in Youtube or other source, why I have to buy video from Godu?

Video in Godu is high quality, full information and documents, feedback, product showed…, made by good lecturer and approved by our team. Moreover you don’t be interrupted by Advertisement.

If I need help from Godu, what should I do?

Hotline on website: Comment on the lecture: Message on homepage: Our CS time is : 7h00-22h00

Can I download video to my computer?

No, according to our intellectual property, you can see video without downloading.

Account and Activation Questions

How to register an account on Godu?

Click on “Đăng ký”, fill in information, submit and you will receive active code by email/phone. Pls log in with active code, then you are the member of (WIP)

I forget password, what should I do

Log in, type your username/ click to “forget password”/ which equipment to receive password. Godu shall send password to you.

I forget username, what should I do

Login by facebook or google or zalo

I want to find the course which was bought

Click on “khóa học của tôi”

How to active the course ?

If you pay by COD If you pay by other: automatically active after payment

How to see video which I already bought from different equipments?

Godu allows you log in from 3 different equipments, you can choose 3 equipment you want regardless computer/laptop/smart phone.You just log in by your user and password then you can study

Purchase and Payment Questions

How to purchase

Purchase only video Purchase only video + Kit Purchase only kit

How to find video as I want

Search item with key word

How to use coupon

Coupon by lecturer Coupon by Godu

I paid but I don’t receive video

Take evidence Contact Godu by hotline or emai Check active code

Payment methods?

Internet banking ATM, JCB, visa, master, Momo Shipping COD

After pay by COD, how can I get video?

How to cancel the order?

Studying Questions

How to adjust quality of video

Video has nothing, slow

How to download App to Android/IOS

How to use full screen to see video

If I buy video, can my friends use it?

We give you 01 account, password, you can use on 3 different equipments. If u want to share it to your friend, it’s ok to use your account in different equipment but not in same time

Study method? What should I do to get best achievement?

Through video opened in App on IOS, android, computer To get best achievement: please watch all videos several time with practicing and contact to lecturer and other learner to discuss

Can I study directly with the lecturer?

After studying through video, if many clients have same demand, Godu shall support to organize an offline lecture, then you can join. The cost shall be shared at that time.

Lecture Questions

How to discuss to lecturer

Comment on lecture page Offline meeting held by Godu

How to post comment on lecture

Can I get email/facebook/phone number of lecturer

Email, facebook/instagram only, not phone number

How can I get document

Send to your register address right after your payment.

How can I upload product

I made many products, can I sell it on website

Many chances for you. Later we shall support market for exchange products made by learner or you can do your own business

How to buy kit to study according to video

Option 1: buy together with video. A kit package is made according to video, you can choose and buy together with video as combo type. Option 2: buy separately kit. There is link on shop page, pls visit, check photo and description and buy

Can we believe quality of the kit?

The kit is prepared by lecture for the course only. The lecturer use it for the course, so that is the most suitable type for studying.

Refund Policy Questions

Condition

Report within 10 days after purchasing the lecture. a/ Video refund: Use less than 3 video within 7 days: refund 100% Use less than 30% courses progress: refund 70% Use less than 50% course progress: refund 50% Use more than 50%: no refund b/ Kit refund Before delivery: refund 100% Within 7 days from the date of receipt the kit: refund 100% After 7 days: not refund

Processing

Contact hotline

I want to change to another course after payment?

I pay more than cost, how can I get back money?

Hãy để lại câu hỏi của bạn

Nhà May - Công đồng những người yêu thích tự tay làm đồ thêu thùa may vá, hội tụ hướng dẫn từ căn bản đến nâng cao những chủ đề xung quanh khâu vá, thêu thùa. Nhà May mong muốn sẽ truyền cảm hứng về ý nghĩa của những món đồ tự khâu vá cho bản thân và cho người yêu thương. May vá không hề khó như mọi người tưởng. Tiệm Tạp Hóa Nhà May cung cấp đầy đủ các nguyên liệu, phụ kiện cho người mới bắt đầu nhập môn Thêu Thùa, May Vá. Các khách hàng của Tiệm sẽ được nhận các tài liệu nhập môn thêu thùa may vá miễn phí và hỗ trợ trọn đời trong quá trình làm đồ, tham gia vào nhóm Khách Hàng Thân Thiết để được hướng dẫn livestream trực tiếp hàng tuần.
